physics involving gravity gravitational field
A gravitational field is the area around a large object, such as a planet, where gravity has an effect. gravitational force
Gravitational force is the same as gravity. gravitational potential energy
Gravitational potential energy is the energy that an object has because it is in a situation where gravity could affect it.
